attributes.action: Don't give any more contracts to BT unless the agree to roll out superfast broadband to 100% of the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
As the de facto supplier of broadband infrastructure in the UK, BT should be forced to renegotiate the the current contract(s) so that the UK can have a broadband service to be proud of.

The government promised us that we would have the fastest broadband in the world; yet some other european countries have plans that will be upto 5 times faster.

It's time the government got some backbone and did as it promised, for a change.
